verses.verse: He that dasheth in <S%H6327>pieces<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> thy <S%H6440>face:<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> the <S%H4694>munition,<s%> <S%H6822>watch<s%> the <S%H1870>way,<s%> make thy loins <S%H2388>strong,<s%> <S%H4975><s%> <S%H553>fortify<s%> thy <S%H3581>power<s%> <S%H3966>mightily.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath turned <S%H7725>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> as the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H1238>emptiers<s%> have <S%H1238>emptied<s%> them out, and <S%H7843>marred<s%> their vine <S%H2156>branches.<s%>

The <S%H4043>shield<s%> of his mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> is made <S%H119>red,<s%> the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> are in <S%H8529>scarlet:<s%> the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> shall be with <S%H784>flaming<s%> <S%H6393>torches<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H3559>preparation,<s%> and the fir <S%H1265>trees<s%> shall be terribly <S%H7477>shaken.<s%>

The <S%H7393>chariots<s%> shall <S%H1984>rage<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets,<s%> they shall jostle one against <S%H8264>another<s%> in the broad <S%H7339>ways:<s%> they shall <S%H4758>seem<s%> like <S%H3940>torches,<s%> they shall <S%H7323>run<s%> like the <S%H1300>lightnings.<s%>

He shall <S%H2142>recount<s%> his <S%H117>worthies:<s%> they shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%> in their <S%H1979>walk;<s%> they shall make <S%H4116>haste<s%> to the <S%H2346>wall<s%> thereof, and the <S%H5526>defense<s%> shall be <S%H3559>prepared.<s%>
The <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> shall be <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and the <S%H1964>palace<s%> shall be <S%H4127>dissolved.<s%>

And <S%H5324>Huzzab<s%> shall be led away <S%H1540>captive,<s%> she shall be brought <S%H5927>up,<s%> and her <S%H519>maids<s%> shall <S%H5090>lead<s%> her as with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3123>doves,<s%> <S%H8608>taboring<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H3824>breasts.<s%>

But <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> is of <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H3117><s%> like a <S%H1295>pool<s%> of <S%H4325>water:<s%> yet <S%H1992>they<s%> shall flee <S%H5127>away.<s%> <S%H5975>Stand,<s%> <S%H5975>stand,<s%> shall they cry; but <S%H369>none<s%> shall look <S%H6437>back.<s%>

Take ye the <S%H962>spoil<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> take the <S%H962>spoil<s%> of <S%H2091>gold:<s%> for there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H8498>store<s%> and <S%H3519>glory<s%> out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H3627>furniture.<s%>

She is <S%H950>empty,<s%> and <S%H4003>void,<s%> and <S%H1110>waste:<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H4549>melteth,<s%> and the <S%H1290>knees<s%> smite <S%H6375>together,<s%> and much <S%H2479>pain<s%> is in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of them <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H6289>blackness.<s%>

Where <S%H346><s%> is the <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> of the <S%H738>lions,<s%> and the feeding <S%H4829>place<s%> of the young <S%H3715>lions,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H738>lion,<s%> even the old <S%H3833>lion,<s%> <S%H1980>walked,<s%> and the <S%H738>lion's<s%> <S%H1482>whelp,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> made them <S%H2729>afraid?<s%>

The <S%H738>lion<s%> did tear in <S%H2963>pieces<s%> <S%H1767>enough<s%> for his <S%H1484>whelps,<s%> and <S%H2614>strangled<s%> for his <S%H3833>lionesses,<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> his <S%H2356>holes<s%> with <S%H2964>prey,<s%> and his <S%H4585>dens<s%> with <S%H2966>ravin.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and I will <S%H1197>burn<s%> her <S%H7393>chariots<s%> in the <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> thy young <S%H3715>lions:<s%> and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> thy <S%H2964>prey<s%> from the <S%H4480>earth,<s%> <S%H776><s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of thy <S%H4397>messengers<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H8085>heard.<s%>
